requirementText.name: Description of the use of the file group
requirementText.description: The value in the mets/fileSec/fileGrp/@USE is the name of the whole folder structure to the data, e.g "Documentation", "Schemas", "Representations/preingest" or "Representations/submission/data".

testCase.description: For each mets/fileSec/fileGrp that exists, mets/fileSec/fileGrp/@USE MUST exist. mets/fileSec/fileGrp/@USE value MUST begin with or equal to a value from VocabularyFileGrpAndStructMapDivisionLabel. mets/fileSec/fileGrp/@USE value MUST match an existing folder path in the package, case insensitive.

rule.description: For each mets/fileSec/fileGrp that exists, mets/fileSec/fileGrp/@USE MUST exist.

error.message: mets/fileSec/fileGrp/@USE attribute does not exist. MUST be: For each mets/fileSec/fileGrp that exists, mets/fileSec/fileGrp/@USE MUST exist.

package.name: fileGrp_USE_not_exist
package.description: METS.xml file has a mets/fileSec/fileGrp with no mets/fileSec/fileGrp/@USE attribute.

package.name: minimal_IP_with_1_representation
package.description: Minimal IP that matches all MUST requirements, plus all SHOULD requirements (both for elements and attributes), incl.: - the folder "documentation" exists (CSIPSTR16) - a fileGrp exists that has mets/fileSec/fileGrp/@USE = "Documentation".

rule.description: mets/fileSec/fileGrp/@USE value MUST begin with or equal to a value from VocabularyFileGrpAndStructMapDivisionLabel.

error.message: mets/fileSec/fileGrp/@USE attribute has incorrect value. MUST be: mets/fileSec/fileGrp/@USE value MUST begin with or equal to a value from VocabularyFileGrpAndStructMapDivisionLabel.

package.name: minimal_IP_with_1_representation
package.description: Minimal IP that matches all MUST requirements, plus all SHOULD requirements (both for elements and attributes), incl.: - the folder "documentation" exists (CSIPSTR16) - a fileGrp exists that has mets/fileSec/fileGrp/@USE = "Documentation" - mets/fileSec/fileGrp/@USE is properly declared for all fileGrp elements.

rule.description: mets/fileSec/fileGrp/@USE value MUST match an existing folder path in the package, case insensitive.

error.message: mets/fileSec/fileGrp/@USE attribute has incorrect value. MUST be: mets/fileSec/fileGrp/@USE value MUST match an existing folder path in the package, case insensitive.

package.description: METS.xml file where: - mets/fileSec/fileGrp/@USE = "Representations/random_string_96ab34a41e". - no folder exists with the name "Representations/random_string_96ab34a41e". Note: the value "Representations/random_string_96ab34a41e" violates only the folder path match, but is OK for vocabulary match (i.e. begins with a value from the vocabulary).
